name: Ann Arbor Second Baptist Church
notes: Bring ID, one visit per month
address: 850 Red Oak Rd, Ann Arbor, MI 48103

name: Bryant Community Center
notes: Two visits per month if eligibility is met. Bring photo ID and proof of residence.
address: 3 West Eden Ct, Ann Arbor, MI 48103

name: Jewish Family Services
notes: Must be a client of JFS, call for information. Sign-up can happen same day during pantry hours.
address: 2245 S. State St, Ann Arbor, MI 48104

name: Muslim Community Association of Ann Arbor and Vicinity
notes: Open distribution

name: Northside Community Center (Catholic Social Services)
notes: Current ID required. Only one full shopping experience per month. Can receive fresh produce weekly.

name: Salvation Army
notes: Clients must bring photo ID, Social Security cards for proof of all dependents in household, current rental lease, proof of household income.

name: The Back Door Food Pantry @ St. Clare Episcopal Church
notes: Open distribution.

name: Trinity Lutheran Church
notes: Fresh Produce Only Available Friday June 16th-Friday September 8th
address: 1400 W Stadium Blvd, Ann Arbor, MI 48103

name: Hope Medical Clinic
notes: For produce, call ahead to schedule an appointment. Can receive produce up to one time per week. For food pantry, call ahead to schedule an appointment. Can attend one food pantry visit per thirty day period. If you are experiencing a food emergency, please call to receive immediate assistance.

name: Bethesda Bible Church
notes: Please call ahead to reserve a spot. You may call up to two weeks in advance until all spots are filled. Please bring state ID.

name: Brown Chapel AME
notes: Hot meals. Open distribution.

name: Calvary Bible Church
notes: Open distribution

name: Christian Life Center Church - Abundant Life Food Pantry
notes: Please call ahead.

name: Christian Love Fellowship
notes: Limit once per month. Must have photo ID and social security card.

name: Community Church of God
notes: Open distribution.

name: Emmanuel Lutheran Church
notes: Need to have current ID. Limit once every three months.

name: Family Inc.
notes: Located inside Christian Tabernacle Church. Open distribution

name: Grace Fellowship Church
notes: Open distribution.

name: Greater Faith Mission
notes: Perishable & non-perishable items. No eligibility requirements. Some clothing items available.

name: Islamic Association of Ypsilanti
notes: Open Distribution. Not visible from road. Located behind Wendy's.

name: Joyful Treats Community Development Corp.
notes: Open distribution.

name: Messias Temple Church
notes: Call ahead for more information. From October 1st to March 31st, clients are eligible to receive groceries and a hot meal. Two separate lines, clients may receive both. From April 1st to September 30th, ONLY groceries are available. NO hot meals during this time. In case of emergency, please call.

name: Metropolitan Memorial Baptist Church
notes: Meet with director to determine eligibility. Bring photo ID.

name: Salvation Army of Ypsilanti
notes: Must be an Ypsilanti resident. Bring photo ID, proof of residency/lease, proof of income. Can visit pantry once per month and receive produce distribution once per week.

name: Schooner Cove
notes: Open distribution. Located in clubhouse.

name: Second Baptist Church-Care & Share Ministry
notes: Contact Anita Miller or Renee Scott for additional information.

name: SOS Community Services
notes: Please call ahead to schedule a pantry appointment. The pantry is available 12 times per calendar year per household. No appointment necessary to receive fresh produce (limit once per week). Receiving produce does not count as one of the 12 visits per year.

name: St. John the Baptist Church & St. Vincent de Paul - Food Cupboard
notes: Available once every month. Must have current photo ID and proof of Washtenaw county residency.

name: Victorious Life Church of God
notes: Open distribution.
